data.eml:eml: Hidden species within the genus Ocys Stephens: the widespread species O. harpaloides (Audinet-Serville) and O. tachysoides (Antoine) (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Bembidiini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maddison, David R., Anderson, Roy (2016): Hidden species within the genus Ocys Stephens: the widespread species O. harpaloides (Audinet-Serville) and O. tachysoides (Antoine) (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Bembidiini). Deutsche Entomologische Zeitschrift 63 (2): 287-301, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.63.10748, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.63.10748
